data.title: Meet 'Guiding Light' stars at Universal on March 21
data.meta_description: Guiding Light, the CBS daytime drama, will be taping on location at Universal from March 16 to 20. You can join the cast members listed below as they celebrate Mardi Gras at Universal Studios on Saturday, March 21 with a daytime autograph signing event and an evening appearance in the Mardi Gras parade. Signing Schedule:...
data.text:
Guiding Light, the CBS daytime drama, will be taping on location at Universal from March 16 to 20. You can join the cast members listed below as they celebrate Mardi Gras at Universal Studios on Saturday, March 21 with a daytime autograph signing event and an evening appearance in the Mardi Gras parade.

Signing Schedule:

10 a.m. to 11 a.m.:

Exclusive Annual Passholder Autograph Signing (Full Cast)

11 a.m. to noon:

Kim Zimmer (Reva Shayne O’Neill)

Jeff Branson (Shayne Lewis)

Robert Newman (Josh Lewis)

Jordan Clarke (Billy Lewis)

Noon to 1 p.m.:

Lawrence Saint-Victor (Remy Boudreau)

Karla Mosley (Christina Moore)

Caitlin VanZandt (Ashlee Wolfe)

Bonnie Dennison (Daisy Lemay)

1 p.m. to 2 p.m.:

Rob Bogue (A.C. Mallet)

Mandy Bruno (Marina Camaletti)

Kurt McKinney (Matt Reardon)

Elizabeth Keifer (Blake Marler)

2 p.m. to 3 p.m.:

Crystal Chappell (Olivia Spencer)

Jessica Leccia (Natalia Rivera)

Frank Dicopoulos (Frank Cooper)

E.J. Bonilla (Rafe Rivera)

3 p.m. to 4 p.m.:

Daniel Cosgrove (Bill Lewis)

Marcy Rylan (Lizzie Spaulding)

Zack Conroy (James Spaulding)

Marj Dusay (Alexandra Spaulding)

Ron Raines (Alan Spaulding)

4 p.m. to 5 p.m.:

Beth Chamberlin (Beth Chamberlin)

Tina Sloan (Lillian Raines)

Grant Aleksander (Phillip Spaulding)

Michael O’Leary (Rick Bauer)

The locations will be announced. See the park map for details.
